archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Approve Order Handling Procedures
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Authoring, reviewing and approving operational procedures developed by Marketing & Offer Management processes prior to customer order handling infrastructure deployment; Extended Description Not used for this process element
